faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.items.0.q: What is CareSync and who can benefit from it?
faq.items.0.a: CareSync is a role-based healthcare assistant platform tailored for patients, doctors, and pharmacists. It streamlines prescription management, reminders, appointment coordination, and secure communication.
faq.items.1.q: How do I manage my prescriptions using CareSync?
faq.items.1.a: Within your dashboard, you can add, view, and update prescriptions. CareSync also sends real-time reminders to help patients stay on track with their medication.
faq.items.2.q: How secure is my data with CareSync?
faq.items.2.a: CareSync is HIPAA-compliant and uses industry-standard encryption and authentication to safeguard all your personal and medical information.
faq.items.3.q: Can I access CareSync on any device?
faq.items.3.a: Absolutely—CareSync is fully responsive, supporting usage on desktops, tablets, and mobile devices through modern browsers.
faq.items.4.q: How do I switch between Dark Mode and Light Mode?
faq.items.4.a: Use the sun/moon icon in the navigation bar to toggle themes.
faq.items.5.q: What if I forget my password?
faq.items.5.a: Click the 'Forgot Password' link on the login page and follow the steps to receive a reset link.
faq.items.6.q: How do I reach out for help or support?
faq.items.6.a: Go to the Contact section and fill out the form or use the provided details for 24/7 support.
faq.items.7.a: CareSync offers a free tier with core features. Enhanced tools and integrations are available via premium plans.
faq.items.8.a: Pricing is flexible based on your organization's needs. See the Pricing page or contact sales.
faq.items.9.q: How does CareSync ensure secure communication between users?
faq.items.9.a: All communications are protected with encrypted channels and access controls.
faq.items.10.q: Can I sync my care data across multiple accounts?
faq.items.10.a: Yes, you can access your data across devices using the same account.
faq.items.11.q: Does CareSync send appointment reminders as well?
faq.items.11.a: Yes. CareSync can notify you about upcoming appointments set by your provider.
faq.items.12.q: Where can I find more info about compliance and privacy?
faq.items.12.a: Visit the GDPR Compliance, Privacy, and Terms sections in the footer.
faq.items.13.a: Yes, our secure API includes documentation for integrations.
faq.items.14.a: We integrate with major EHR systems, scheduling tools, and more.
faq.items.15.q: Where can I find product documentation?
faq.items.15.a: Access API documentation and user guides from the Documentation section.
faq.items.16.a: Help Center, Community forum, Webinars, and Status page are available.
faq.items.17.q: How does CareSync comply with privacy laws?
faq.items.17.a: We follow GDPR, HIPAA, and other standards; details in Privacy and Terms pages.
features.subtitle: Comprehensive healthcare management platform designed to meet the demanding requirements of modern healthcare organizations with enterprise-grade security and scalability.
features.security.title: Advanced Security
features.security.description: Your data is always protected with enterprise-grade security protocols.
features.analytics.title: Powerful Analytics

features.collab.description: Enable seamless communication between doctors, patients, and pharmacies.

features.infra.description: Scalable and reliable cloud hosting for uninterrupted healthcare access.

features.access.title: Mobile Access
features.access.description: Access healthcare from your phone or tablet, anytime, anywhere.
features.monitor.title: 24/7 Monitoring
features.monitor.description: Real-time monitoring of appointments, patient status, and emergencies.
features.ai.title: AI Assistance
features.ai.description: Leverage artificial intelligence for faster diagnosis and better care.
